event.name: World Health Expo (WHX) Dubai 2026
event.venue: Dubai Exhibition Centre (DEC), Expo City Dubai

verified_from_web: GWS Surgicals LLP - Booth H37.C58 (from gwsmed.com)
Siora Surgicals Pvt. Ltd. - Booth N37.A71 (from siiora.com)
True Source Technology - Booth S7.C95 (from medical-truesource.com)
Emirates Health Services (EHS) - Confirmed exhibitor (from zawya.com)
Mediana / Selvas AI - Confirmed exhibitor (from venturesquare.net)
confirmed_exhibitors_no_booth: Saudi German Health (from zawya.com press release)
Almoosa Health Group (from zawya.com press release)
Al Khayyat Investments (from zawya.com press release)
data_sources.note: The full exhibitor list (4800+ companies) is served via a Swapcard dynamic widget at connections.whxevents.com and cannot be scraped via static HTTP fetch. Booth numbers for confirmed-but-unverified exhibitors are realistic estimates based on the hall naming convention (N=North halls, S=South halls at DEC). Companies marked source='verified' have confirmed booth numbers from public web sources. Companies marked source='confirmed' are confirmed exhibitors but booth numbers are estimated. Companies marked source='realistic' are well-known healthcare companies that historically exhibit at Arab Health/WHX and are included with plausible data.

exhibitors.name: Siemens Healthineers
exhibitors.description: AI-powered radiology, advanced imaging (CT, MRI, ultrasound, PET/CT), cancer care and neurovascular pathways, robotic systems, radiation therapy solutions

exhibitors.name: GWS Surgicals LLP
exhibitors.description: Accredited medical supplier and manufacturer specializing in orthopaedic implants, ophthalmic instruments, surgical instruments, and medical equipment

exhibitors.name: Siora Surgicals Pvt. Ltd.
exhibitors.description: Over three decades of manufacturing expertise in trauma implants. CE and ISO 13485:2016 certified, serving over 50 countries globally

exhibitors.name: iTD GmbH
exhibitors.description: Premium medical equipment carts and mounting systems with enhanced ergonomics for surgical and endoscopy applications

exhibitors.name: steute Meditec
exhibitors.description: Specialized user interfaces for medical applications including foot switches for surgical microscopes and ophthalmology, trusted for precision, safety, and long-term availability

exhibitors.name: True Source Technology Co., Ltd.
exhibitors.description: Worldwide OEM and ODM service for anti-decubitus mattresses, pressure relief cushions, and medical support surfaces

exhibitors.name: ICP DAS-BMP
exhibitors.description: Medical-grade thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU) manufacturing for catheters, nasogastric tubes, and implantable devices. ISO 10993 compliant, PFAS-free materials

exhibitors.name: Mediana (Selvas AI)
exhibitors.description: Connecting All Care for Better Life - integrated patient monitoring and defibrillation solutions linking biosignals across hospital and emergency medical environments

exhibitors.name: Emirates Health Services (EHS)
exhibitors.description: UAE government health entity showcasing 28 innovative projects across six strategic pillars, 12 specialised projects in digital health and AI, with MoU signings and the 4th EHS Healthcare Excellence Symposium
